resources.string: DESCRIPTION: This activity is used to reproduce music. It has declaration of all buttons used, and the next step would be declaring onClickListeners for previous, play and next buttons. MusicPlayer class should be used.
DESCRIPTION: TextView will be replaced wit ExtendableListView and the play button should send information about album name and list of tracks via intent.

DESCRIPTION: TextView will be replaced wit ExtendableListView and the play button should send information about playlist name and list of tracks via intent. Add playlist button is used to add new item to list.
DESCRIPTION: add shoping cart is used to add items user would like to buy, after that Android Pay API is used to process payment.
